title: Couple Who Set Sail In Self-Built Eco-Friendly Yacht Found Dead In Lifeboat
content: Brett Clibbery and Sarah Packwood embarked across the Atlantic Ocean, sailing from Halifax to the Azores in their self-built, eco-friendly yacht, Theros.
summary: Brett Clibbery and Sarah Packwood embarked across the Atlantic Ocean, sailing from Halifax to the Azores in their self-built, eco-friendly yacht, Theros.

title: All Democratic Party Chairs Endorse Kamala Harris As Biden Exits Poll Race
content: State Democratic party chairs on Sunday threw their weight behind Vice President Kamala Harris to be the party's new presidential nominee to run against Republican nominee and former president, Donald Trump.
summary: State Democratic party chairs on Sunday threw their weight behind Vice President Kamala Harris to be the party's new presidential nominee to run against Republican nominee and former president, Donald Trump.

title: "Israel's Enemies Know...": Netanyahu On US Ties After Biden's Poll Exit
content: Israel will be the United States' strongest ally in the Middle East regardless of who is elected president in November, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday before flying to Washington, where he was due to address the U.S. Congress.
summary: Israel will be the United States' strongest ally in the Middle East regardless of who is elected president in November, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Monday before flying to Washington, where he was due to address the U.S. Congress.

title: "Starlink Satellites Could Be Destroyed If...": What China Study Says

title: Ukraine Operation Is "Priority", Says Russia As Biden Quits Election Race
content: After US President Joe Biden abandoned his reelection bid, the Kremlin said that for Russia the most important thing was achieving its goals in the Ukraine war not US politics where Moscow said much could change over coming months.
summary: After US President Joe Biden abandoned his reelection bid, the Kremlin said that for Russia the most important thing was achieving its goals in the Ukraine war not US politics where Moscow said much could change over coming months.

title: Over 500 People, Including Opposition Leaders, Arrested In Bangladesh
content: More than 500 people, including some opposition leaders, have been arrested so far over days of clashes in the Bangladeshi capital Dhaka sparked by protests against job quotas, police said Monday.
summary: More than 500 people, including some opposition leaders, have been arrested so far over days of clashes in the Bangladeshi capital Dhaka sparked by protests against job quotas, police said Monday.

title: In Sudan, Women Forced To Line Up For Sex With Soldiers For Food: Report
content: In war-torn Sudan, women are being forced to have sex with soldiers to get food to feed their families, a report by The Guardian said.
summary: In war-torn Sudan, women are being forced to have sex with soldiers to get food to feed their families, a report by The Guardian said.

title: 3 Dead, 16 Others Shot Outside A Nightclub In US' Mississippi
content: At least three people were killed and 16 others were injured after a gunman opened fire near a nightclub in the US state of Mississippi, local media reported.
summary: At least three people were killed and 16 others were injured after a gunman opened fire near a nightclub in the US state of Mississippi, local media reported.

title: If She Wins, Kamala Harris Will Be The First Woman To Become US President
content: Vice President Kamala Harris wasted no time launching her 2024 presidential campaign, seeking the support of fellow Democrats with the backing of President Joe Biden after he pulled out of the race amid concerns about his age and health.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris wasted no time launching her 2024 presidential campaign, seeking the support of fellow Democrats with the backing of President Joe Biden after he pulled out of the race amid concerns about his age and health.

title: All Eyes On AI To Drive Big Tech Earnings

title: Analysis: How Kamala Harris' Nomination Could Reshape Trump Campaign
content: Donald Trump will try to show swing voters that his likely new rival, Vice President Kamala Harris, has her fingerprints all over two issues he is counting on for victory in November: immigration and the cost of living.

title: Vietnamese Tycoon On Trial For $146 Million Fraud In Corruption Crackdown
content: A former Vietnamese property and aviation tycoon charged with $146 million in fraud and stock market manipulation went on trial in Hanoi Monday, the latest corruption case targeting the communist country's business elite.
summary: A former Vietnamese property and aviation tycoon charged with $146 million in fraud and stock market manipulation went on trial in Hanoi Monday, the latest corruption case targeting the communist country's business elite.

title: 4 New Zealand Deaths Linked To Online "Suicide Kits" Sold By Canadian Chef
content: A New Zealand coroner has formally linked four deaths to the sale of "suicide kits" bought online from a former Canadian chef, according to findings published Monday.
summary: A New Zealand coroner has formally linked four deaths to the sale of "suicide kits" bought online from a former Canadian chef, according to findings published Monday.

title: Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi Yet To Endorse Kamala Harris For Presidential Job
